about_the_game:
In a not so distant future, humanity has reached the very edges of the galaxy.
Perfect genetically improved clones of the most beautiful women on Earth are now used in combat and exploration missions.
With the unique ability to synchronize and control powerful robots, they are the ultimate AI companions.
